label: schemeName
comment: The name of the scheme or programme introduced by the government for public welfare and development.

label: schemeID
comment: The unique ID representing the scheme corresponding to this observation.

label: year
comment: Year corresponding to this observation and is described in YYYY format, for eg. 2020.

label: eligibleBeneficiaries
comment: Represents the group(s) or category(ies) of people who can avail the benefits of the scheme corresponding to this observation.

label: beneficiaryCount
comment: Represents the count of people benefited under the scheme corresponding to this observation.

label: grantAmount
comment: The amount released for the public welfare under the scheme from the total budget corresponding to this observation.

label: sanctionedAmount
comment: The actual amount spent from the grant/allocated amount for the scheme.

label: departmentID
comment: Unique ID or code associated with the department which is associated with the service or the issue corresponding to this observation.

label: department
comment: Division or section of the organization corresponding to this observation. Eg. Health, Transport.

label: landExtent
comment: Area of the land corresponding to this observation.

label: landHolding
comment: The aggregate land possession attributed to a farmer.

label: cropType
comment: Type of the crop species. For eg., Pulses, Cereals, Legumes, Veg Proteins, cash crop etc

label: dueDate
comment: The deadline for making a payment or the final date for applying to avail a service corresponding to this observation.

label: mediaURL
comment: Link(s) to any image(s) or media of the entity or incident corresponding to this observation

label: applicationProcess
comment: The step by step process for applying for a service or completing an application.

label: localeInfo
comment: Locale information corresponding to this observation.

label: purposeDescription
comment: Describes the purpose of the entity or service corresponding to this observation.

label: govtName
comment: The name of the government associated with the entity or service related to this observation.

label: landGeography
comment: The geographic characteristics of the land such as desert, hilly, etc

label: valueChainPhase
comment: Value Chain is the series of activities and processes that a product or service goes through, from the initial raw material stage to the final delivery to the customer. It encompasses every step involved in the creation, production, distribution, and eventual consumption of a product or service. This field corresponds to the phase of the agricutural value chain to which the scheme applies to.
